DOC.brief_title: Acute Fatty Acid Intervention Study ( AFAST )
DOC.detailed_description: Nutrition play key role development metabolic disorder like cardiovascular disease metabolic syndrome . Nutrients contribute risk develop disease fatty acid ( FAs ) . It known fatty acid mediate metabolic effect via change gene expression , bind subsequent activation transcription factor peroxisome proliferator-activated receptor ( PPAR ) . In addition , know unsaturated fatty acid well ligand PPAR saturate fatty acid . Peripheral blood mononuclear cell ( PBMC ) express PPARalpha relatively easy isolate whole blood . We previously show gene expression profile cell reflect free fatty acid increase fast . The question still remain whether dietary FA influence gene expression similar way , , whether different dietary FA result different gene expression change subsequent activation pathway .
DOC.criteria: Healthy Caucasian men age 18 30 year Allergic fish oil Allergic margarine Allergic cow milk dairy product Current recent ( < 4 week ) use fish oil supplement four time fish/week ; 24.35 g EPADHA fish per month ( 800 mg/day ) judge questionnaire . Body mass index ( BMI ) < 18 > 25 kg/m2 Urine glucose concentration outside normal range ( low nondetectable ) Fasting blood glucose outside normal range ( 3 5.5 mmol/L ) Tobacco smoke Taking medication may influence study result Received inoculation within 2 month start study plan study Donated intend donate blood 2 month study till two month study Diagnosed longterm medical condition ( eg. , diabetes , hemophilia , cardiovascular disease , anemia , gastrointestinal disease ) Vegetarian
